entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Easy way to determine the "Default" language version #27535
  • Update test once runtime AOT target changes are in the SDK repo #27533
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #27532
  • [NetSDKE2E] Error "does not verify: no digest" occurs when installing SDK 6.0.401 on RedHat 8.6 #27523

Closed

  • HttpClient fails to connect over SSL when running `dotnet 3.1` on Fedora:36 #27360
  • NETSDK1152 "multiple publis h output files with the same relative path" with completely different paths coming from NuGet package #27536
  • Incorrect parsing of msbuild parameters #27526

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Backport of https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/27510 #27541
    Area-CodeFlow, 7.0.1xx
  • Hot reload script injection improvements #27537
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • apicompat: sort suppressions #27500
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Update AOT test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1973416 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27479
    Area-Infrastructure
